column1: Uchi////The best sushi spot in houston. I used to prefer uptown sushi but this spot is awesome. Im in town for work probably 15 days a month and this place is spectacular. I admit im not a houstonian but am familiar with sushi spots and this is definitely at the top for right now. The location is perfect
column2: very central to everything love going by here then hitting up catbirds nearby or anvil.
